data.title: War Zone List
data.meta_description: Here you will find a list of the areas of the world where our risk analysts estimate that there is a heightened risk right now.
data.text:
In most cases you have the possibility to take our a War Zone Insurance Policy with us, if you are planning a trip to one of the countries on the list. (It is a prerequisite that you have a Global Corporate Travel Insurance to take our a War Zone insurance).

Please contact our Corporate Support to hear about your options.

Land Krigszone Afghanistan Whole country Belarus Whole country Burkina Faso Whole country Central African Republic Whole country Haiti Whole country Iran Whole country Iraq Whole country Israel Whole country Lebanon Whole country Libya Whole country Myanmar Whole country Niger Whole country Palestinian Territories Whole country Russia (East of Ural) Whole country Russia (West of Ural) Whole country South Sudan Whole country Sudan Whole country Syria Whole country Ukraine Whole country Yemen Whole country
